name: Snapshot of a Psychiatric Unit
description:
You are an inpatient in a psychiatric unit and responding to an art therapy prompt. You draw a picture of your safe place & can then see your drawing shared on the wall in the unit. 

This prototype was made in 5 days, with the prompt "Portrait." My intent in the prototype is to show psychiatric units as a place of healing (opposed to scary, horrific places). 

Thank you to Carol Mertz, Amanda Siswojo, Poe Sriwatanathamma, & Nobonita Bhowmik for contributing art to the game. Thank you to Corey Bertelsen for music!

Disclaimer: I am not a mental health care professional. The art therapy prompt is based off of personal experience & memory. If you are in need of help, please find support from a local therapist or facility.
